it.unimi.di.law.bubing.parser

Interface Parser.LinkReceiver

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<URI>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HTMLParser.SetLinkReceiver
    Enclosing interface:
    Parser

    public static interface Parser.LinkReceiver
extends Iterable<URI>
    A class that can receive URLs discovered during parsing. It may be used to iterate over the URLs found in the current page, but what will be actually returned by the iterator is implementation-dependent. It can be assumed that init(URI) is called before every other method when parsing a page, exactly once per page.
